name: Concorde Hotel Kuala Lumpur

reviews.text: Stayed one night for work. It's a pretty old hotel that's still stuck in a recent past era and the rooms show it. Took a premiere room which was a really good size but fixtures all from late 80s early 90s. Nicely big though and great location BUT if you leave something bpehind like I did, in the shower room - brand new, fresh from duty free skII toiletries etc....you wont get the back. I called an hour later after checking in to another klhotel and only ot a response a day later, which later pingpong'd. 3 days later the exec chef says they're gone. Lots of back and forth till I realized it's a lost cause. ShAme on you Concorde. It's not like a csi investigation. Get your house in order.
reviews.title: Watch your stuff!

reviews.text: The price is quite high per room per night but everything is so good. It's in the center of KL and near the MRT station. Helpful and informative staffs.
reviews.title: Good hotel with Hard Rock Cafe right beside

reviews.text: we had suite room with separate living room and the room are ok with old decor.....shower room are good and audio system in room included.breakfast are poor.and very2 dissapointed with main door staff with no smile and sour face.location are very2 good.
reviews.title: good hotel and average service....

reviews.text: Well the Concorde has very good ambiance and lobby.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: The rooms are very good with WI-FI internet in rooms.
reviews.title: Great Hotel and Great location

reviews.text: Been staying here on business and leisure for a decade now if not slightly more. Excellent location, great staff at the Premiere Lounge, great location. In the end, no place is perfect but in KL I would never stay anywhere else despite some glitches over the years. Call it sentimental but if it ain't broke, why fix it? I could rattle off a list of negative issues (always fixed in my experience) but these would be way over shaddowed by the plus points I could list out on the same piece of paper. Just wished the corporate rates were better!
reviews.title: Always god to be back

reviews.text: i went there for 3 days business trip. the service was good. but beware of the charge when u come back from the hotel. i give my credit card for deposit and they promise me will waive the charges on the day i check out. But now is already half month from the check out date and nothing has been done. i already called the hotel for 3 times and the answer are same said they already called the merchant bank, but when i check with my bank, the bank said no instruction given to waive the fund! i am very angry for the extra charge for RM348 x 3 times means RM1038!!! wasting my time to call here and there, the worst thing is, nothing can be done!
reviews.title: BEWARE OF THIS HOTEL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had booked a non smoking deluxe room - according to the website from floors 13 - 16 - but were checked into a room on floor 7. The room looked ok, but smelled like the preson before had smoked so we called the front desk and were relocated into a room on floor 16. Perfect... nice view to the twin towers and a very comfortable bed - almost too comfortable to get out of bed :)
reviews.title: Had to change room, but then it was very good

reviews.text: Close to KLCC and somehow everything we wanted to visit. The Monorail almost infront of the hotel is a big plus.
reviews.title: solid as always!

reviews.text: Not stopped here for a while, but booked a 3 night trip on business. Done a renovation since I last stopped and a good room with large shower. Hotel was booked due to location and monorail outside due to the difficulties of getting a taxi in KL. Easy connection to get to sentral and then onto KLIA. Walking distance to KLCC is also ok probably a brisk 10 mins down P Ramlee past all the bars and resturants.
reviews.title: Convenient Location

reviews.text: the hotel foryer pool area fantasic along with the staff - Only stayed 3 nights but that was enough in that room family suit - room very old along with the funiture I would rate the room 3 star at best
reviews.title: disapointing rooms and very old dacore

reviews.text: However food was fantasic
reviews.title: The best staff & atmosphere.

reviews.text: Fantastic Hotel. The most friendly & helpful staff. Great restaurants. Fabulous atmosphere. Clean & spacious rooms Made to feel really special. Will definately be back & will be recommending to all we know.
reviews.title: Location! Location! Location

reviews.text: Smooth and fast check in/out. The room 1813 was clean and homy. Breakfast at Spice was also good, we could see the twin tower from our table, the resto has good cheese, bread and laksa nyonya (tipical Malaysian spicy noodle soup). At Melting Pot, the resto next to lobby has very good pizza margherita (big pitty that the waiters didn't know what pizza margherita was, but if you can explain the ingredient, they will make one very delicious for you ... yummy). Not forgoting, just 10 min. walk to the twin tower / KLCC, 5 minutes or just two station by monorail to Bukit Bintang Shopping walk. We'll definetely go back here again and recommend our family and friends.
reviews.title: Very average accommodations

reviews.text: We have stayed here a few times when have been in KL until a friend recommended another hotel. Our rooms at times have not been as clean as we had expected considering the money spent. Our opinion is the rooms are fighting for an average rating. Across the road is the Shangri la,for slightly more more money the two places feel worlds apart.
reviews.title: close to petronas

reviews.text: My trip in March to KL was my second one and also my second stay at the Concorde hotel. It is perfect for business travellers, very central and very reasonable rates.
reviews.title: Good value for money & central

reviews.text: Just be aware when making your booking to request the refurbished rooms because the ones under construction is terrible.
reviews.title: Classy Hotel

reviews.text: Also if you are noise sensitive, rather book the deluxe rooms as they are on the quiet side of the hotel with spectcular views on the Petronas towers.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel has a great in house dining menu, well worth the ringgits.
reviews.title: Great hotel love it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is within very easy walking distance of the Petronas towers and shopping centre. Also right next to a busy high way for easy access to taxis. The hotel is a very short taxi trip to the other nicer shopping centres like the Pavilion and Sungi Wang.
reviews.title: Location is the biggest advantage

description: Attractive Contemporary Hotel set in central business district, 75 km from airport.
